message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $135?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $135. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I understand you're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get as much as I can for the product. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but I still think $130 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to go down to $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $129?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $127?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $128?
